name: Shadow Ooze
description: The Shadow Ooze is a medium, dark mass that consumes light, with the ability to move through tight spaces easily.
memorable: Its ability to create an area of darkness, rendering foes blind and disrupting spells reliant on light, is particularly frightening.
goals: To survive by consuming light and overwhelming creatures in darkness.
relations: May be found near other oozes or in dark, lightless environments.
environment: Typically found in dark areas where light sources are scarce.
strengths: Immunity to acid and necrotic damage, along with several condition immunities.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it ineffective at dodging attacks; lacks intelligence and charm.
attacks: Uses a pseudopod attack dealing bludgeoning, necrotic, and acid damage, followed by the ability to extinguish light sources.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Darkness, creating an area of darkness that obscures vision and hinders light-based spells.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Stealthy with a skill modifier of +2, enhancing its capability to remain undetected in darkness.
additional_information: Capable of climbing difficult surfaces, including upside down.
Has low passive perception, making it less aware of its surroundings.
Consumes both natural and magical light, creating significant tactical challenges.
Incapable of complex thought or social interaction.
test_queries: dark shadow creature that consumes light
shadowy ooze with strength and darkness abilities
creature that moves through tight spaces in darkness
ooze that can extinguish light sources
dark mass that uses stealth and ambush tactics
